title: Athlete

Athlete Information

Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump distance also increases by 50%. Class Features Athlete: Standing Up

How to unlock Athlete

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Athlete

All Classes at Level 4
